species.name: barbaracle
descriptions: Barbaracle’s legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head’s orders.
Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start to act on their own to ensure the enemy’s defeat.
Seven Binacle come together to form one Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head gives orders to those serving as the limbs.
When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.

abilities.name: tough-claws
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.

abilities.name: sniper
abilities.effect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.

abilities.name: pickpocket
abilities.effect: Steals attacking Pokémon's held items on contact.
